title: W
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''w''' is the command to [[wield]] [[weapon]]s.
*Pressing '''W''' is the command to wear [[armour]]. 
*Pressing '''CTRL''' + '''w''' is the command to create a waypoint, allowing for easy travel back to that point. Waypoints can also be created by pressing '''*''' then '''w'''.

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''w''' represents a [[worm]]-type monster or a tentacle.
*'''W''' represents a [[wraith]]-type monster.
